name: 恐怖文學專題研究
comment: 上課教室在雲和街大樓二樓，地址為雲和街1號(位於雲和小火鍋斜對面、Cafe a la mode正對面)，從師大側門右轉看見Starbucks右轉進入巷子步行約2分鐘(130公尺)，右手邊就會看到雲和街大樓，亦可使用Google Maps APP查詢位置。請同學使用學生證感應，進出雲和街上課教室。
description: Students taking this course will be oriented into the various trends (i.e. supernatural, body, domestic, serial-killing narrative) and motifs (i.e. excess, metamorphosis, liminality, perversion, and evil) of horror genre. Horror classics by H. P. Lovecraft, Alfred Hitchcock, Stephen King and Jonathan Demme will be studied in detail through the theoretical, critical frameworks of Franco Moretti, Slavoj Žižek, Mladen Dolar, Joan Copjec, Barbara Creed and Richard Kearney. Reading materials are chosen with a view to both “theory and practice” of horror genre and arranged according to various topics. Not only psychical realm but also political, ethnic, moral and techno-cultural agendas constitute the main concerns of this course. Developing students’ competence in textual analyses and critical, theoretical thinking is the major objective of this course.
goals: This course requires students to lay their foundation of research in accurate textual analysis of various works on demonic possession and exorcism.
This course emphasizes understanding of historical contexts of “events” and “practices.”
Students will be trained to cultivate critical, theoretical thinking
